snippet: The Broadway theater owner Jordan Roth on Thursday night assured the cast of the Pulitzer Prize-winning play "Clybourne Park" that the show would open on Broadway in April as planned, despite the departure of two of its lead producers.
abstract: The Broadway theater owner Jordan Roth on Thursday night assured the cast of the Pulitzer Prize-winning play "Clybourne Park" that the show would open on Broadway in April as planned, despite the departure of two of its lead producers.

headline.main: 'Clybourne Park' to Open as Planned on Broadway
headline.print_headline: ‘Clybourne Park’ to Open As Planned on Broadway
